channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Upstate New York prison guard pleads guilty to manslaughter in an inmate’s 2024 beating death
item.description: A correctional officer has pleaded guilty to manslaughter in the December death of inmate Robert Brooks, whose brutal beating while handcuffed at an upstate New York prison was recorded by body cameras.

item.title: From debate to dialogue: In a contentious era, ‘Ethics Bowl’ offers students a gentler alternative
How Alcatraz became America’s most notorious prison
